DOC.brief_summary: To assess objective response rate ( RECIST ) ZD6474 100 , 200 300 mg/day respectively
DOC.brief_title: ZD6474 Phase IIa Dose Finding Multicentre Study
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent . Life expectancy 12 week longer . Pregnancy , breast feed female patient wish become pregnant . Treatment nonapproved investigational drug within 30 day enrolment
